attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-0156

Date: 2014-02-18

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 16(2) of the Canadian Space Agency Act, approves the remuneration and other employment conditions of Chris Hadfield, Astronaut, as established by the Canadian Space Agency and set out in the annexed schedule, effective July 3, 2013.


   Sur recommandation du premier ministre et en vertu du paragraphe 16(2) de la Loi sur l = Agence spatiale du Canada, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil agrée à la rémunération et autres conditions d = emploi de Chris Hadfield, astronaute, fixées par l = Agence spatiale canadienne et indiquées à l = annexe ci-jointe, à compter du 3 juillet 2013.
attachmentText:
PC Number: 2014-0156Date: 2014-02-18


	 	 His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 16(2) of the Canadian Space Agency Act, approves the remuneration and other employment conditions of Chris Hadfield, Astronaut, as established by the Canadian Space Agency and set out in the annexed schedule, effective July 3, 2013.
